observation: Defi Connect- Real world application of DeFi in healthcare, transportation and logistics  Products Swap OTC DeFiFarm Connect WELCOME TO DEFICONNECT DefiConnect is a revolutionized digital community with state-of-the-art, real-world cryptocurrency powered solutions in digital marketing, healthcare (with Move2Earn), transportation, and logistics. BUY DFC Read White Paper Join Our Community 30k+ Telegram Followers 50.1k+ Twitter Followers 1.9k+ Facebook Followers 260+ Youtube Followers DFC Holders Our Products Tokenomics Unlike every other system, being a part of our DefiConnect gives you real time access into how the chains binding our demand and supply system really works. This transparency metric is a first of its kind that will ensure you make informed decisions as to what degree of your asset is being created in a more predictable way. V2 Contract address: Token Name: Symbol: Total Suply: Decimal: ABOUT US DefiConnect is likened to an ecosystem with huge potentials and opportunities that will bring about a major positive shift in the financial economy. This will also encumber into the social sphere as well as impacting political transparency. More than just trading on exchanges, our currency (DFC) serves as a passing link into incentives rarely experienced in other ecosystems .we have successfully executed and stretched the domains of crypto currency beyond just financial transactions. We have also molded the generic block chain technology for specific use cases with a lightweight and easy-to-customize implementation. Why deficonnect Endless rewards The viability of our super real life applications has consistently ensured that a whooping 25% Free transactions With DefiConnect, you are in full control of the funds as we have eliminated third-party expenses by charging zero extra monthly subscription fees. Transparency To further reinstate our level of commitment, The addresses and daily profit accumulation records of token holders will be on open display on our platforms at a single click. Real-world application We are connecting Defi with every aspect that makes up the real-life departments. DEHIM Healthcare (Coming Soon) Our healthcare application can be envisaged in five core areas: Managing electronic medical records Protection of healthcare data Personal health record data management The acquisition of our tokens as a digital asset automatically opens you up to using our health package. Once you come on board as a member, our mobile health app, and remote monitoring ensures the security of your electronic medical records on our network and rewards you for leaving a healthy live by engaging in physical execise. Your data can be rapidly sent to trusted and certified medical personnel in case of an emergency. It is also available for self-monitoring and home care for personal use. OUR TEAM In an ever evolving space championed by the rapid advances in technology and increased access to markets, the need to be agile, flexible, and adaptable have become a necessity. Our team comprises of a collection of versatile individuals with experience who have earned the title of expert in their field. ROADMAP DefiConnect is all about building real world applications that bring the many benefits of the DeFi ecosystem to our everyday lives. Some plans here might evolve with time, but it will remain consistent with the long term vision of connecting DeFi to our lives by building real world applications that benefit our regular everyday lives. Stable Naira Defipay UI Revamp Save to Earn (Crypto Bank) Monthly Buy Back and Burn from Defipay Revenue Defipay Intensive Marketing (20000 D.A.U) Delta7 (Play to Earn) Healthcare Insurance Marketplace The future of DefiConnect is solely hinged on the success and growth of our community. With a large chunk of our projects already in the pipeline, we intend to become the face of the crypto community in Africa and help our members grow their wealth and enjoy seamless services on our platforms. Secured By Partners & Exchanges As Seen On Frequently asked Questions What is DEFIConnect? DefiConnect is likened to an ecosystem with huge potentials and opportunities that will bring about a major positive shift in the financial economy. Why is deficonnect the best choice? You can gain endless reward from token farming - Transparency - Real-Life applications that can be used in transportation sector, health sector as well as developing defipay which is the cryptop payment gateway that can be used both online and offline What is DFC? DFC token is DefiConnect's digital coin which has been designed to fluently align with other currencies both within and beyond the DeFiConnect space where business is conducted.. When was DFC as a token launched? 22nd May, 2021. Has DFC received any Audit report? Yes - SolidProof, Certik How many people are currently holding DFC Token? 36,888 are currently holding DFC tokens How is DFC Token different from other cryptocurrency? Like any other token, It is used as a store of value and can equally be used as a medium of exchange. Further, it has a strong team and community, yielding high interest from token farming and rapid growth On what exchange can one find the DFC? Latoken, pancakeswap, Hotbit, Coinsbit and bitmat What is the total supply? 200,000,000,000,000 DFC How many tokens have been burnt so far? 108,000,000,500,000(54.0000%) What is the impact of token farming on the ecosystem? It discourages token dump and encourages more HODL which an increases in price of DFC How can we differentiate DFC of Deficonnect from other DFC? DFC token has a unique contract address which can be gotten from deficonnect.tech. What is the target of deficonnect before December,2021 elapse To increase the price by 25x What is the relationship between Deficonnect and Club250cent? Club250cent is one of the first project launched on the deficonnect MLM Launchpad. Who are the major promoters of DFC? The total volume supplied is very high, what are strategies put in place to to reduce this volume? Constant Burning and 10% of the token planted is locked forever When Defipay comes out, will it be used worldwide? Yes Can it be used with other token? Is there any tokonomics for this token DFC? Visit www.deficonnect.tech and read the whitepaper Email: anthony@deficonnect.tech | info@deficonnect.tech Contract Address: 0x97A143545c0F8200222C051aC0a2Fc93ACBE6bA2 112,000,002.25 (54%) Burned Tokens Invest Now FAQs Copyright Â© 2020.All Rights Reserved By DFC Trade V2

thought: The website does not have unusually low prices, claims of free, or impossible amounts of money. However, it does contain information on the non-existent company "DefiConnect" and offers products and services that are not common on e-commerce websites. The email address and contract address seem appropriate for business use, but the website does not provide clear customer privacy information. The payment methods are not mentioned, and there is no information about when the content was last updated.

thought: The WHOIS information shows that the domain deficonnect.tech is registered to Anthony Ademu from Merry World Media in Lagos, Nigeria. The domain has been registered since May 2021 and is set to expire in 2024. It seems to be a legitimate registration. Based on the analysis, the URL https://deficonnect.tech/ is not a scam website.

observation.reason: The website does not have unusually low prices or claims of free nor does it make impossible claims of money. However it does contain information about a non-existent company and offers services and products that are not common on e-commerce websites. The website also lacks clear customer privacy information and there is no mention of when the content was last updated. The domain is registered to a legitimate name and organization.
